alert.note: Alert for La Plata (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 30 at 8:53PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT MDT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Arroyo and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southwest Colorado, including the following county, La Plata. * WHEN...Until midnight MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 853 PM MDT, satellite and lightning data indicate heavy rain from thunderstorms in the advisory area. This will cause arroyo and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Durango, Breen, Bondad, Kline, Marvel and Redmesa.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
